---
id: get-plan-by-id
title: "Get Plan by ID"
description: "The **Get Plan by ID** endpoint lets you retrieve detailed information about a specific subscription plan using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to manage and review individual plans effectively."
sidebar_label: "Get Plan by ID"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true

sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Plan by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/plan/{planId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The **Get Plan by ID** endpoint lets you retrieve detailed information about a specific subscription plan using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to manage and review individual plans effectively.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"The unique identifier of the plan.","name":"planId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
